comments:
I20061121-1845 + Compare & JDT & Text plug-ins from 20061124_0719 GMT

I get an AFE when I open an outgoing change in a model-based CVS synchronization. Works fine from non-model-based synchronizations.

It could be that I only get this AFE because I don't have the team plug-ins from HEAD. If so, please close this bug.

Notes on the error message:
- should have space after :
- caled -> called


Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: null argument:This method cannot be caled until after prepareInput is called

Also happens when comparing two revisions from the History view.
If you have Compare from HEAD, you need Team/UI from HEAD as well.
